name: code_transformers-assets
comment: Common methods used by transfomers for dealing with asset IDs.

uriToAssetId.name: uriToAssetId
uriToAssetId.comment:
Create an code_transformers/barback-asset_id.AssetId for a code_transformers/code_transformers-assets.uriToAssetId.url seen in the code_transformers/code_transformers-assets.uriToAssetId.source asset.

By default this is used to resolve relative urls that occur in HTML assets, including cross-package urls of the form "packages/foo/bar.html". Dart "package:" urls are not resolved unless code_transformers/code_transformers-assets.uriToAssetId.source is Dart file (has a .dart extension).

This function returns null if code_transformers/code_transformers-assets.uriToAssetId.url can't be resolved. We log a warning message in code_transformers/code_transformers-assets.uriToAssetId.logger if we know the reason why resolution failed. This happens, for example, when using incorrect paths to reach into another package, or when errorsOnAbsolute is true and the url seems to be absolute.
